abstract: What will this year’s Allen & Company annual media retreat — a traditional birthplace of headline-grabbing deals — yield? Perhaps nothing, some industry observers told Reuters.
snippet: What will this year’s Allen & Company annual media retreat — a traditional birthplace of headline-grabbing deals — yield? Perhaps nothing, some industry observers told Reuters.
lead_paragraph: Last year, the annual Allen & Company media retreat in Sun Valley, Idaho, gave rise to the biggest media deal of 2009, Comcast‘s purchase of a controlling stake in NBC Universal.

headline.main: Will Sun Valley Yield Any Deals This Year?
